title: Interactive educational platform
description_1: The didactic position to the car mechatronics laboratory provides an interactive educational platform, enabling students to learn how to create engine maps.The main element of the position is a universal control computer, which allows control of the engine with spark ignition and electronic fuel injection.
description_2: Students have the opportunity to experiment with various settings and configurations, as well as creating engine maps.By analyzing the input data from sensors such as position, temperature or vacuum, and appropriate programming of the controller, they can create engine maps, adapting its operation to various operating conditions.The didactic position to the car mechatronics laboratory provides an interactive educational platform, enabling students to learn how to create engine maps.The main element of the position is a universal control computer, which allows control of the engine with spark ignition and electronic fuel injection.
description_3: Creating engine map maps is not only programming skills, but also a deeper understanding of the engine mechanisms and the impact of various parameters on its efficiency and performance.Thanks to practical exercises in a didactic position, students acquire the necessary knowledge and skills in the field of diagnostics, repair and optimization of engine operation, which prepares them to practice the profession of electromechanics or car mechatronics.
